```{=html}
  <script>
  (function() {
    var toggle = document.querySelector('.sp-nav-toggle');
    var menu = document.querySelector('.sp-nav-menu');
    if (toggle && menu) {
      toggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
        var open = menu.classList.toggle('is-open');
        toggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', open);
      });
      document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        if (!e.target.closest('.sp-nav')) {
          menu.classList.remove('is-open');
          toggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        }
      });
    }
    var nav = document.querySelector('.sp-nav');
    var page = nav ? nav.getAttribute('data-page') : null;
    if (page) {
      var el = nav.querySelector('[data-nav="' + page + '"]');
      if (el) {
        el.classList.add('is-active');
        var group = el.closest('.sp-nav-group');
        if (group) group.classList.add('has-active-child');
      }
    }
  })();
  </script>

    <h1 style="font-family: 'Courier New', Consolas, monospace; font-size: 28px; font-weight: bold; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0 0 8px 0; letter-spacing: 2px;">MY PASSPORT</h1>

      <!-- Experience cards inserted by JS -->
    </div>

  <!-- Stats -->
  <div style="display: flex; gap: 16px; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-bottom: 28px;">
    <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 150px; background: #0D2818; border: 1px solid #1A4731; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; text-align: center;">
      <div id="stat-completed" style="font-size: 36px; font-weight: bold; color: #16A34A;">0</div>

    </div>
    <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 150px; background: #1E1B4B; border: 1px solid #C7D2FE; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; text-align: center;">
      <div id="stat-remaining" style="font-size: 36px; font-weight: bold; color: #4F46E5;">7</div>
      <div style="font-size: 13px; color: #A5B4FC;">Remaining</div>
    </div>
    <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 150px; background: #3D2E0A; border: 1px solid #FDE68A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; text-align: center;">
      <div id="stat-badges" style="font-size: 36px; font-weight: bold; color: #D97706;">0</div>

    </div>

    <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(180px, 1fr)); gap: 16px;">
      <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px;">
        <span style="font-size: 32px;">üß™</span>
        <div>
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Explorer</div>
          <div style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B;">Complete 1 experience</div>
        </div>
      </div>

        <span style="font-size: 32px;">üß†</span>

          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">Thinker</div>
          <div style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B;">Complete 3 experiences</div>
        </div>
      </div>

<script>
(function() {
  // Core experiences (all roles)
  const coreExperiences = [
    { id: 'is-this-ai', name: 'Is This AI?', emoji: 'üîç', subtitle: 'Detection & Awareness', url: 'experiences/is-this-ai.html' },
    { id: 'what-would-you-do', name: 'What Would You Do?', emoji: 'ü§î', subtitle: 'Ethics & Dilemmas', url: 'experiences/what-would-you-do.html' },
    { id: 'rules-of-engagement', name: 'Rules of Engagement', emoji: 'üìã', subtitle: 'Policy & Governance', url: 'experiences/rules-of-engagement.html' },
    { id: 'teaching-with-ai', name: 'Working with AI', emoji: 'ü§ù', subtitle: 'Co-Creation & Integration', url: 'experiences/teaching-with-ai.html' }
  ];

  // Role-based experiences
  const roleExperiences = [
    { id: 'ai-proof-assessments', name: 'AI-Proof Your Assessments', emoji: 'üõ°Ô∏è', subtitle: 'Assessment Design', url: 'experiences/ai-proof-assessments.html' },
    { id: 'working-with-copilot', name: 'Working with Copilot', emoji: 'ü§ñ', subtitle: 'Microsoft 365 Copilot', url: 'experiences/working-with-copilot.html' },
    { id: 'researching-with-ai', name: 'Researching with AI', emoji: 'üî¨', subtitle: 'AI-Assisted Research', url: 'experiences/researching-with-ai.html' }
  ];

  // All experiences combined
  const experiences = [...coreExperiences, ...roleExperiences];

  // Badge definitions
  const badges = [
    { id: 'explorer', emoji: 'üß™', name: 'Explorer', requirement: 1 },
    { id: 'thinker', emoji: 'üß†', name: 'Thinker', requirement: 3 },
    { id: 'builder', emoji: 'üõ†Ô∏è', name: 'Builder', requirement: 5 },
    { id: 'champion', emoji: 'üèÜ', name: 'Champion', requirement: 6 } // 5 + workshop
  ];

  // Get completions from localStorage
  function getCompletions() {
    try {
      return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    } catch (e) {
      return {};
    }
  }

  // Count completed experiences
  function countCompleted() {
    const completions = getCompletions();
    return experiences.filter(exp => completions[exp.id]).length;
  }

  // Check for workshop attendance (stored separately)
  function hasWorkshopBadge() {
    try {
      return localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-workshop') === 'true';
    } catch (e) {
      return false;
    }
  }

  // Render badge display
  function renderBadges() {
    const container = document.getElementById('badge-display');
    const completedCount = countCompleted();
    const hasWorkshop = hasWorkshopBadge();
    const totalForChampion = completedCount + (hasWorkshop ? 1 : 0);

    let badgeHtml = '';
    let earnedCount = 0;

    badges.forEach(badge => {
      const earned = (badge.id === 'champion')
        ? (completedCount >= 5 && hasWorkshop)
        : completedCount >= badge.requirement;

      if (earned) earnedCount++;

      badgeHtml += `
        <div style="text-align: center; opacity: ${earned ? '1' : '0.3'}; transition: opacity 0.3s;">
          <div style="font-size: 48px; ${earned ? '' : 'filter: grayscale(100%);'}">${badge.emoji}</div>
          <div style="font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; color: ${earned ? '#E2E8F0' : '#94A3B8'}; margin-top: 4px;">${badge.name}</div>
          ${earned ? '<div style="font-size: 11px; color: #22C55E;">‚úì Earned</div>' : ''}
        </div>
      `;
    });

    container.innerHTML = badgeHtml;
    document.getElementById('stat-badges').textContent = earnedCount;

    // Update message
    const messageEl = document.getElementById('badge-message');
    if (completedCount === 0) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = 'Complete your first experience to earn the <strong>üß™ Explorer</strong> badge!';
    } else if (completedCount < 3) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = `${3 - completedCount} more experience${3 - completedCount > 1 ? 's' : ''} to earn <strong>üß† Thinker</strong>`;
    } else if (completedCount < 5) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = `${5 - completedCount} more experience${5 - completedCount > 1 ? 's' : ''} to earn <strong>üõ†Ô∏è Builder</strong>`;
    } else if (!hasWorkshop) {
      messageEl.innerHTML = 'All experiences complete! Attend a workshop to earn <strong>üèÜ Champion</strong>';
    } else {
      messageEl.innerHTML = 'üéâ <strong>Congratulations!</strong> You\'ve earned all badges!';
    }
  }

  // Render a single experience card
  function renderExpCard(exp, index, completions) {
    const completion = completions[exp.id];
    const isComplete = !!completion;
    const completedDate = completion ? new Date(completion.completedAt).toLocaleDateString() : null;

    return `
      <a href="${exp.url}" style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; padding: 16px 20px; background: ${isComplete ? '#0D2818' : '#16162A'}; border: 1px solid ${isComplete ? '#1A4731' : '#2D2D4A'}; border-radius: 10px; text-decoration: none; color: inherit; transition: border-color 0.2s;" onmouseover="this.style.borderColor='#4F46E5'" onmouseout="this.style.borderColor='${isComplete ? '#1A4731' : '#2D2D4A'}'">
        <span style="font-size: 28px;">${exp.emoji}</span>
        <div style="flex: 1;">
          <div style="font-weight: bold; color: #E2E8F0;">${index + 1}. ${exp.name}</div>
          <div style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B;">${exp.subtitle}</div>
        </div>
        <div style="text-align: right;">
          ${isComplete
            ? `<div style="color: #22C55E; font-weight: bold;">‚úì Complete</div>
               <div style="font-size: 12px; color: #64748B;">${completedDate}</div>`
            : `<div style="color: #94A3B8;">Not started</div>`
          }
        </div>
      </a>
    `;
  }

  // Render experience list
  function renderExperiences() {
    const container = document.getElementById('experience-list');
    const completions = getCompletions();

    let html = '';

    // Core experiences header
    html += '<div style="font-family: \'Courier New\', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 4px;">Core Experiences</div>';
    html += '<div style="font-size: 13px; color: #94A3B8; margin-bottom: 12px;">For all staff ‚Äî teaching, research, and admin</div>';

    coreExperiences.forEach((exp, index) => {
      html += renderExpCard(exp, index + 1, completions);
    });

    // Separator
    html += '<div style="border-top: 1px solid #2D2D4A; margin: 20px 0; position: relative;"><span style="position: absolute; top: -10px; left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); background: #16162A; padding: 0 12px; font-size: 12px; color: #64748B;">&#8226; &#8226; &#8226;</span></div>';

    // Role-based experiences header
    html += '<div style="font-family: \'Courier New\', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 4px;">Role-Based Experiences</div>';
    html += '<div style="font-size: 13px; color: #94A3B8; margin-bottom: 12px;">Choose the ones relevant to your role</div>';

    roleExperiences.forEach((exp, index) => {
      html += renderExpCard(exp, coreExperiences.length + index + 1, completions);
    });

    container.innerHTML = html;

    // Update stats
    const completedCount = countCompleted();
    document.getElementById('stat-completed').textContent = completedCount;
    document.getElementById('stat-remaining').textContent = experiences.length - completedCount;
  }

  // Initialize
  renderBadges();
  renderExperiences();

  // Refresh on focus (in case user completed something in another tab)
  window.addEventListener('focus', function() {
    renderBadges();
    renderExperiences();
  });
})();
</script>
```
